design.resource: ## Script (Python) "PagoPa0" ##bind container=container ##bind context=context ##bind namespace= ##bind script=script ##bind subpath=traverse_subpath ##parameters=doc=None ##title= ## doc=context.getDocument(doc) doc.setItem('pagopa_enabled',0) ll = doc.getItem('iol_menu_list') doc.setItem('Form',ll[len(ll)-2]) return 'ok'
